name: node-tsconfig-paths
description: Load node modules at run-time according to tsconfig.json paths.
author: Jonas Kello

scripts.start:example: yarn tsc && cd example && ts-node -r ../lib/register.js main.ts
scripts.publish:major: yarn run build && node scripts/publish.js major
scripts.publish:minor: yarn run build && node scripts/publish.js minor
scripts.publish:patch: yarn run build && node scripts/publish.js patch
